Summary: Huge, more than 1000 ft wingspan. Around 7 connected bright lights,
divs: sighting detailshuge, more than 1000 ft wingspan. around 7 connected bright lights, seen from behind flying north very slowly, then smoothly banked to the west and behind the horizon\ hill line. i shouted and pointed , "wtf is that?" and my wife and 4 yo old daughter and i all stared with mouths agape. w had about a 10 sec good look. it must have been about a mile away. time was just around last twilight. even my litle girl , a frequent flyer on airplanes asked... daddy was that a spac ship?
